original_text: After they prayed, the place where they were meeting was shaken. And they were all filled with the Holy Spirit and spoke the word of God boldly.
korean_text: 빌기를 다하매 모인 곳이 진동하더니 무리가 다 성령이 충만하여 담대히 하나님의 말씀을 전하니라

sentences.original_text: the place where they were meeting was shaken
And they were all filled with the Holy Spirit
and spoke the word of God boldly
